Chap. 92 - To O. A. Olsen

                                                    O - 20 - 1890 

                                Battle Creek, Mich., Oct. 7, 1890. Dear Brother Olsen,-- 
     My mind has been troubled over the things in Michigan and other conferences. But Michigan is the great heart of the work; here are the working powers that have a decided influence upon the work in all its movements throughout all our conferences. As matters have been presented to me again and again in reference to the spiritual condition of the publishing house in Battle Creek, I see a very sad picture.
